pageProduct.name: Swisse Ultibiotic Daily Digestive Probiotic 90 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultibiotic Daily Digestive Probiotic is a premium quality formula combining three clinically trialled strains-Bifidobacterium lactis (HN019), Bifidobacterium lactis (BI-04) and Lactobacillus acidophilus (La-14).

Swisse Ultibiotic Daily Digestive Probiotic is specifically formulated to:



  • Support healthy digestion to maintain general health and wellbeing

  • Help restore natural balance of friendly intestinal flora: levels of good bacteria in the gut may be reduced with certain medications, health conditions and in the elderly

  • Help promote beneficial bacterial growth

  • Relieve symptoms of digestive discomfort including abdominal bloating and flatulence

  • Support immune system to fight illness.

Size: 90 Pack

Warnings

If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare practitioner.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

No added lactose, gluten, yeast, egg, soy, artificial colours or artificial flavours.

Gluten free and dairy free.

Ingredients

EACH CAPSULE CONTAINS:
B. lactis (HOWARU® bifido HN019) 5 billion CFU
B. lactis (BI-04) 15 billion CFU
L. acidophilus (La-14) 15 billion CFU


Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:
One capsule daily, or as directed by a healthcare professional.
Suitable for children over 1 year of age - capsule can be opened and contents added to cold or lukewarm water, milk, or food.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

Do not use if cap seal is broken.
